definition: to view as dangerous (idiom); afraid to do sth
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
dangerous road/(fig.) perilous or intimidating undertaking
to turn pale at the mention of a tiger (idiom)/to be scared at the mere mention of
lit. the mountains are high and the torrents swift/to undertake an arduous task or journey (idiom)
to seek an answer/to look for an explanation/to explain/explanation
one can't tell how many/numerous similar cases
lit. to make one's way through a dangerous pass as if walking on level ground (idiom)/fig. to handle a crisis effortlessly
intimidate at the first glance (idiom); awe-inspiring/terrifying/overwhelming
